rules_text:
Choose two –
• Until end of turn if an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
• Create three 1/1 green Snake creature tokens.
• Create a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.
• Create a 3/3 red Manticore creature token with haste.
notes:
blue white red green 
four color command
